resources.string: CREATE TABLE place_type ( idplace_type INTEGER NOT NULL , name TEXT NULL , image TEXT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (idplace_type) );

CREATE TABLE place ( idplace INTEGER NOT NULL , name TEXT NOT NULL , x REAL NULL , y REAL NULL , radius REAL NULL , comments TEXT NULL , photo TEXT NULL , idplace_type INTEGER NULL , PRIMARY KEY (idplace));

CREATE TABLE task ( idtask INTEGER NOT NULL , name TEXT NOT NULL , desired_time INTEGER NULL DEFAULT 10 , time_limits TEXT NULL , priority INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 3 , creation_time DATETIME NOT NULL , comments TEXT NULL , place_idplace INTEGER NULL , PRIMARY KEY (idtask));
